Message:
For some fresh air,
I left the moldy portrait
and went outside.

But, all I saw were thick
clouds and sunken ruins...

If this stupid Curse
had never existed,

would these streets still
be filled with the same
energy they once had before?

My apprentice...
and my friends...
Would they all still
be laughing by my side?

My painting buddies
were the first to go,
and then everyone else
frantically followed,
as if cursed creatures
were chasing after them.

There are so many
better places out there.
Of course they’d leave.

Hmm...
Now then, I wonder if
there’s anything I can
use to paint with.
